# Data Types, Strings, and Introduction to dplyr

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

1. Understand and work with different R data types
2. Manipulate strings using the `stringr` package
3. Apply basic regular expressions for pattern matching
4. Use the pipe operator for readable code
5. Filter and select data using `dplyr`
